actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation with amendment, S. Rept. 95-216.
Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate (similar provisions inserted in H.R. 4297 as passed Senate).

official_title: A bill to amend section 304 of the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act of 1972, as amended, to extend the authorization of appropriations.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation with amendment, S. Rept. 95-216) Amends the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act to extend the authorization of appropriations to fiscal years 1978 and 1979. Repeals the directive that the Secretary of Commerce establish a continuing program of research on the long-range effects of pollution, overfishing, and man-induced changes in ocean ecosystems.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 304 of the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act of 1972, as amended, to extend the authorization of appropriations.
